    Pretty Scree Plot with CIs for Eigenvalues

Pretty Scree Plot with CIs for Eigenvalues

Source: vignettes/ScreePlot_ConfidenceIntervalls_ForObservedEigenvalues.Rmd
ScreePlot_ConfidenceIntervalls_ForObservedEigenvalues.Rmd

Purpose

One of the most pressing and important question in factor analysis (fa) or principale component analysis (pca) is the number of factors to retain

Example Results Pretty - Scree-Plot + CI

For PCA & EFA

PICTURE 2B Inserted

Producing the Example Plots

For the popular mtcars dataset

library(datscience)
library(boot)
# Run a Parallel Analysis (Horn, 1965), save the parallel object
parallel_analysis <- psych::fa.parallel(mtcars, fa="both")
#> Warning in fa.stats(r = r, f = f, phi = phi, n.obs = n.obs, np.obs = np.obs, :
#> The estimated weights for the factor scores are probably incorrect. Try a
#> different factor score estimation method.

#> Parallel analysis suggests that the number of factors =  2  and the number of components =  2

Create Bootstrapped Confidence Intervals for observed Eigenvalues

PCA Eigenvalues CIs 

PCA_bootObj <- booted_eigenvalues(mtcars, iterations = 500, fa = "pc")
PCA_bootObj
#> 
#> ORDINARY NONPARAMETRIC BOOTSTRAP
#> 
#> 
#> Call:
#> boot::boot(data = df, statistic = eigenvalues_extractor, R = iterations, 
#>     fa = fa, fm = fm, cor = cor)
#> 
#> 
#> Bootstrap Statistics :
#>        original       bias    std. error

#> t2*  2.65046789 -0.031358794 0.495308918

PCA_CIs <- getCIs(PCA_bootObj)

EFA Eigenvalues CIs 

EFA_bootObj <- booted_eigenvalues(mtcars, iterations = 500, fa = "fa")
EFA_bootObj
#> 
#> ORDINARY NONPARAMETRIC BOOTSTRAP
#> 
#> 
#> Call:
#> boot::boot(data = df, statistic = eigenvalues_extractor, R = iterations, 
#>     fa = fa, fm = fm, cor = cor)
#> 
#> 
#> Bootstrap Statistics :
#>         original       bias    std. error
#> t1*   6.30271788  0.176352942  0.52673064
#> t2*   1.99094869 -0.048530193  0.42929069
#> t3*   0.19953591  0.038107920  0.11697610
#> t4*   0.04283995  0.004329361  0.02512770
#> t5*  -0.06366855  0.018860464  0.02839313
#> t6*  -0.11356808  0.013926222  0.03529439
#> t7*  -0.14973394 -0.018529407  0.04647122
#> t8*  -0.31108851  0.007698867  0.07429360
#> t9*  -0.43061117  0.014964523  0.08671024
#> t10* -0.55344934  0.017259087  0.08970848
#> t11* -0.61120381 -0.048095762  0.09137326

EFA_CIs <- getCIs(EFA_bootObj)

Create Pretty Scree 

PCA_Plot <- pretty_scree(parallel_analysis,fa="pc")
EFA_Plot <- pretty_scree(parallel_analysis,fa="fa")

Adding Confidence Intervals for Observed Eigenvalues 


PCA_Plot <- add_ci_2plot(PCA_Plot,PCA_CIs,type="errorbars")
EFA_Plot <- add_ci_2plot(EFA_Plot,EFA_CIs,type="band")

PCA_Plot

EFA_Plot
